# calculator.rb
class Calculator
  def add(x, y)
    x + y
  end
end

# calculator_spec.rb
require './calculator.rb'

describe "calculator" do
  it "adds numbers" do
    calc = Calculator.new
    expect(calc.add(2,3)).to eql(5)
  end
end

# flags.rb
module Flags
  Truthy = :truthy
end

# flags_spec.rb
require './flags.rb'

describe 'for flag module' do
  context 'when ruby symbol is involved' do
    subject { Flags::Truthy }
    it { expect(subject).to eq(:truthy)}
  end
end
